title: Squid Dog

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Spraying a target with ink will prevent them from whispering or looking into day chat for the day. They will be notified that a Squid Dog is responsible.
- If they had attempted to use an ability on another Latex, they will instead be transfurred instantly, regardless of Willpower.

desc:
Post 5086
*"The ink appears to be normal squid ink, but actually can sometimes contain a neurohazardous agent that can temporarily knock a victim unconsious, allowing it to transfur the target. We're looking into how to counter this." -Dr.███████, MIT.*
